personal.name: Hareesh Raj

personal.bio: Building digital products with a focus on user experience and performance. I turn complex problems into simple, beautiful solutions.

experience.description: Architecting the next generation of cloud dashboards. Improved load times by 40% and implemented a new design system used across 5 products.
